tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  patient_age INT,
  patient_gender VARCHAR(10),
  patient_location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name STRING,
    age INT,
    gender STRING,
    address STRING,
    phone_number STRING
);

CREATE TABLE medical_records (
    record_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id UUID REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    doctor_name STRING,
    diagnosis STRING,
    prescription TEXT,
    appointment_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT REFERENCES Patients(patient_id),
    condition VARCHAR(100),
    treatment VARCHAR(100),
    doctor VARCHAR(50),
    date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT,
    quantity INT,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  address VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE MedicalRecords (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  diagnosis VARCHAR(50),
  treatment VARCHAR(100),
  date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LabResults (
  result_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  test_name VARCHAR(50),
  result VARCHAR(50),
  date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ResourcePlanning (
  plan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  department VARCHAR(50),
  required_staff INT,
  equipment VARCHAR(50),
  budget DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE HealthRecords (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    date DATE,
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50),
    diagnosis VARCHAR(100),
    prescription TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE MedicalFacilities (
    facility_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    facility_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    capacity INT,
    type VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE ResearchStudies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    researcher_name VARCHAR(50),
    facility_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES MedicalFacilities(facility_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Resources (
    resource_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    resource_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    resource_type VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT,
    facility_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES MedicalFacilities(facility_id)
)
